testcase.name: Search in Subcategories - Product belongs to Parent category
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Home Page.....................................................passed When I click on search button...............................................passed Then Write mac into Search Criteria input...................................passed And Select the parent category from the dropdown field......................passed And I click on Search in Subcategories checkbox.............................passed And I click on button search................................................passed Then Check if mac is in the name of the results.............................passed

testcase.name: Search in Subcategories - Product does not belong to Parent category
